alert.note: Alert for Pima; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 08 at 3:05PM MST until August 08 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... South central Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 304 PM MST, a wall of dust was near Avra Valley, or 7 miles west of Marana, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Detected by spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 226 and 236. Locations impacted include... Marana, Avra Valley, Picture Rocks and Red Rock. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
